TopicTitle: Rocket with a LOT of stages

Articles.Content:
The rules are simple:

Each reply is a new stage of a rocket and you must specify what that stage contains. Each stage must have its own engines and multiple engines from multiple stages cannot be active at the same time.

You must also state the status of the rocket at the end of the stage.

Let’s start: A simple liquid fuel stage. Sub-orbital trajectory.

Floor 2 Ehm, sorry

Stage 2: Vacuum SRB stage. 400km LEO.
Stage 4: second boost stage, permitting a Minmus flyby.
Stage 5: Interplanetary NERVA stage, allowing the rocket to correct its course to head to the planet of its choosing.
